EmailTemplate.name: 17.Core.AirFrame.none.N.G.E.12204.AirFrame CTO.Email 1 - Reinventing your telco
EmailTemplate.subject: Is your Telco business ready for the cloud?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Reinventing your telco Deliver successful cloud transformation by planning for the future One of the fundamental steps in any cloud transformation plan is defining a network architecture that meets your consumers’ current and future demands. Download our paper to see how you can do this and what you should invest in. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
